description: Allows the entity follow another entity. Both entities must be swimming [ie, in water].
title: Swim With Entity

success_rate.title: Success Rate
success_rate.description: Percent chance to start following another entity, if not already doing so. 1.0 = 100%.

chance_to_stop.title: Chance To Stop
chance_to_stop.description: Percent chance to stop following the current entity, if they're riding another entity or they're not swimming. 1.0 = 100%.

state_check_interval.title: State Check Interval
state_check_interval.description: Time (in seconds) between checks to determine if this entity should catch up to the entity being followed or match the direction of the entity being followed.

catch_up_threshold.title: Catch Up Threshold
catch_up_threshold.description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will speed up to reach that entity.

match_direction_threshold.title: Match Direction Threshold
match_direction_threshold.description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will try to match that entity's direction.

catch_up_multiplier.title: Catch Up Multiplier
catch_up_multiplier.description: The multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when matching another entity's direction.

speed_multiplier.title: Speed Multiplier
speed_multiplier.description: The multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when trying to catch up to the entity being followed.

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: Radius around this entity to search for another entity to follow.

stop_distance.title: Stop Distance
stop_distance.description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will stop following that entity.

entity_types.title: Entity Types
entity_types.description: Filters which types of entities are valid to follow.
